description: Order: (1) Denying Motion to Proceed in Forma Pauperis (ECF No.  2 ) and (2) Dismissing Civil Action.  Motion for Leave to Proceed in forma pauperis. The Court grants Plaintiff forty-five (45) days leave from the date this Order is filed to: (a) prep ay the entire $402 civil filing and administrative fee in full; or (b) complete and file a properly supported motion to proceed IFP which includes a certified copy of his prison trust account statement for the 6-month period preceding the filing of his Complaint. Signed by Judge Gonzalo P. Curiel on 5/19/23. (All non-registered users served via U.S. Mail Service)(jmo)
